summary: PlayStation is a popular video game brand made by Sony. It includes many consoles, handheld devices, and online services. The first PlayStation came out in 1994 and sold over 100 million units. Its successor, PlayStation 2, is the best-selling home console with over 155 million sold. PlayStation 3, 4, and 5 also did well, with PS5 selling 10 million in 249 days. The brand has different controllers, like the DualShock, and handhelds like PlayStation Portable (PSP) and PlayStation Vita. PlayStation Network is an online service with over 100 million users, offering games and multimedia. PlayStation Studios creates exclusive games for these consoles.
title: PlayStation
